attributes.additional_details:
The Welsh Government has not listened to nearly half a million people with regards to 20 mph restrictions.
It has decided to increase its numbers with 36 more Assembly Members without a referendum.
It has concentrated on Vanity projects whilst our NHS in Wales is the worst in the uk and our Children’s Education has suffered.
The Senedd have prioritised Clean Air above necessary services.
attributes.background:
I believe that only the UK Government can discuss this issue.
Welsh Government makes its own rules and cannot be challenged by its people.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the a similar action: 

Referendum on whether to abolish the Welsh Parliament

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/702156
